nodes.bodyText: i think it would be better and clearer to set it correctly at the factory in the first place, e.g. https://github.com/hazelcast/hazelcast/blob/master/hazelcast/src/main/java/com/hazelcast/client/impl/clientside/ClientExceptionFactory.java#L220 rather than trying to fix it here.
An off-topic proposal. This branch could be further improved to handle causes for unknown exceptions. See hazelcast/hazelcast-nodejs-client#576 (comment) for more details.
